Posts.Title: One year follow up crystalred7 crystalred7

Posts.Content: crystalred7 wrote: Its been one year since my last Mammo, Ultra Sound and MRI. I am scheduled to have a bilateral mammo and US on the 28th. When I called the doctor to set up my appointment the nurse said "based on your MRI results from last year he wants a bilateral mammo and US just in case." I hate all the waiting, waiting for test to be done waiting for results....waiting waiting waiting..... I still have the lump as it is bigger and more distinguishable. I have put this lump in the back of my mind but after getting my reminder to set up my appointment it starts to stress me out. From what I remember the MRI basically said that my breast were extremely dense and they said it could not really see anything. The biopsy that was done was a little difficult and he said he was "pretty sure" he got the right spot biopsied and it did not come back as anything specific. Breast Cancer Awareness month really gets my mind thinking. I am just venting. Thank you all who take the time to read this. Many hugs to all the ladies in waiting. Crystalred7 Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: One year follow up on lump crystalred7 crystalred7
